title: Storm Reid on Optimism
description:
Storm Reid appeared alongside Brad Pitt and Lupita Nyong'o in 12 Years A Slave before she even hit puberty--then went on to earn Teen Choice Award and NAACP Image Award nominations for her breakout role in Ava DuVernay’s A Wrinkle in Time. Now at age 17, she’s lighting up the small screen on HBO’s Euphoria. Laura Brown chatted with her about her ebullience, optimism, and her big, big love for Atlanta, Georgia.
